column4: his is the ubuntu channel is there no one here who can help me get my wireless card powered on

:regeya i think u have my answer
hooray!  I'm glad to hear that, sankalp; I truly am. :-)
how should I know; I've never packaged anything for debian :-/  sorry, but this isn't a channel of devs + sankalp.  there are many guides online to creating debs though.

I don't know if it's pertinent to your program, but if you're just wanting dpkg to handle it, and if it works for that, checkinstall can manage some software...basically if it can be installed with a make install it can usually be handled by checkinstall
